name: Sun-Dried Tomatoes, 3oz Bag (Pack of 2) Dry Halves, Ready to Eat, by CALIFORNIA SUN DRY | Gluten-Free and Antioxidant Rich
short_description: READY TO USE: Our sundried tomato halves are ready to enjoy straight from the bag. Top off a pizza or foccacia, or add to a charcuterie board or vegetable tray.

VERSATILE: Whether you are sprucing up one of your favorite recipes or using one of ours, you won't be disappointed in the amazing flavor our sun-dried tomatoes add to any appetizer, soup, salad or entree
RECIPE IDEA: Wrap sundried tomato halves in thinly sliced salami or prosciutto and secure with toothpicks for an easy addition to an appetizer tray.
HIGH QUALITY: Our tomatoes dry slowly over 7 to 10 days drenched in the California sun for superior flavor and texture. We use up to 21 pounds of fresh tomato to make ONE pound of sun-dried tomato

OUR PROCESS: At the peak of ripeness and flavor, the tomatoes are delivered to our drying facility. There, the tomatoes are washed, cut in half, and placed on large drying trays. The drying trays are then distributed throughout our 27 acre drying facility to actually dry in the sun for a period of 7 to 10 days. When the tomatoes reach just the right moisture level, we gather them up and send them to our packing facility to be used in one of our many delicious sun dried tomato products

name: Naturesweet, Tomato Cherry Cherub Conventional, 10 Ounce
short_description: Selected and stored fresh
Sourced with high quality standards

Delicious on their own as a healthy snack or as part of a recipe
product_description: The World's Favorite Snacking Tomato: Bursting with sweetness, NatureSweet Cherubs grape tomatoes are the perfect bite-sized treat for salads or snacking straight from the container. Ethically Sourced, Unmatched Flavor: Our tomatoes are Fair Trade & EFI Certified, ensuring fair wages, safe working conditions, community development and education programs for our Associates. At NatureSweet, we cover the cost of the Fair Trade Premium so that we can transform more lives without increasing the cost to the consumer. Vine-Ripened & Hand-Picked: Carefully nurtured in greenhouses and harvested at peak ripeness for maximum flavor and freshness. Hand-picked to preserve that burst of flavor which made Cherubs loved by adults and children. Naturally Sweet & Nutritious: Packed with Vitamin C for immunity and healthy skin, Lycopene for heart health, and Beta-Carotene to support eye and bone health, these non-GMO tomatoes are a delicious way to support healthy living. Sustainable & Socially Responsible: A Certified B Corp committed to fair labor practices, environmental sustainability, and community support. We pay transformational wages and support the community development of our Associates.

product_description: Who are we? name: Cento Chefs Sun Dried Tomatoes in Oil & Spices for Pasta, Salad & Antipasto - Grown and Processed in Italy - Gluten-Free, Non-GMO, Low Sodium Italian Tomatoes - 10 Ounce Jar
short_description: Fresh Packed Flavor - Grown under the warm Italian sun, these fresh tomatoes are carefully dried, then halved and jarred to preserve their bursting flavor.

Versatile Pantry Staple - Our gluten-free, non-GMO, and low-sodium sundried tomatoes are extremely versatile and provide a flavorful boost for many dishes, like pastas, antipasto, salads, and sandwiches.
Authentic Italian Taste - Enhance your culinary creations with this mouthwatering ingredient that combines the richness of sun dried tomato marinated in oil and traditional Italian spices.
Grown and Produced in Italy - All Cento Products are made with the freshest ingredients available. We maintain strict specifications, from seed to shelf, to ensure superior quality.

Trust Your Family with Our Family - For over 60 years, Cento Fine Foods has been providing consistent, premium Italian products. Widely recognized by the world's top chefs, Cento is your complete source for authentic Italian.
product_description: Discover the authentic taste of Italy with Cento Chef’s Cut Sun Dried Tomatoes. Grown under the warm Italian sun, these tomatoes are carefully dried and then halved to preserve their bursting flavor. Infused with a delectable marinade of oil and spices, these sun-dried tomatoes are the perfect complement to any antipasto platter or salad, adding depth and a hint of Mediterranean flair. Enhance your culinary creations with this mouthwatering ingredient that combines the richness of sun dried tomato with the tang of traditional Italian spices. Ideal for chefs and food enthusiasts alike, these tomatoes offer versatile flavor that stands up in any recipe. Whether stirred into a sun-dried tomato pesto, tossed in a Mediterranean salad, or used in an antipasto, Cento Chef's tomatoes bring a burst of flavor. Their vibrant essence is captured in a way that highlights the natural qualities of fresh vegetables, making them a superb choice for enhancing both simple and gourmet dishes. Try them in your next culinary masterpiece and elevate your dishes with the irresistible taste of sun-dried Italian tomatoes. Crafted for those who appreciate quality ingredients, Cento Chef’s Cut Sun Dried Tomatoes are more than just an addition—every bite is a celebration of tradition. Let these flavorful dried vegetables inspire your next meal with the authentic taste of sun dried tomatoes in oil. Perfect for creating an exquisite vine-ripe tomato-based tapenade or simply enjoying the rich taste, these prepared vegetables promise to transform ordinary meals into extraordinary dining experiences.
